summary:
A mid-senior level business professional with experience managing commercial functions, financial planning and facilitating revenue & profitability growth. I made positive impact in current & previous roles across large international organizations in Telecommunication, Software, Technology, Financial Sector etc. Managed headquarter functions of organization having 10 Operating Companies, 200 million customers and generating $10B yearly revenue; in top-notch diverse, international and multicultural environment. Also led commercial & financial functions in regional operating companies. I supervised teams, managed cross functional activites in agile environment around the world and led global projects as in-house consultant. I am a highly engaged & motivated professional to perform under pressure with minimum supervision, ability to sync activities with business transformation, break status quo and blend into company culture. In several roles, directly reported to senior management members and worked in a team positioned across different time zones with independent mindset. Having excellent track record in key business functions together with advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills, I had experience dealing and supporting senior management with commercial & financial insights to make decisions, develop future strategic direction and execute action plans.

AREAS OF EXPERTISE:
Business planning and analysis, Budgeting, Financial planning, Commercial strategy, International project management, Business case, Investment feasibility, Pricing, Product, Business operations, Executive reporting & presentation, Commercial control, Leadership, Excel, Powerpoint.
